My name is Kash Rangan.

I've been researching

business can bring value

access to medicines,

access to clean water,
sanitation, healthcare,

how can we provide

the financial system.

level of societal problems,

your organization.

management of the stakeholders

the well-being for society.

out of the COVID epidemic.

What my research

business leaders should know.

Number two, it gives you

The same kind of setup that

I'm very optimistic
that business

at the base of the
pyramid business models

I think there's

Profit and purpose
